entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.9°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -37.2°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
